faqs.question: Who do you work with?
faqs.answer: We mostly work with physical businesses that have 1 to 3 locations or are just starting out. But we are open to working with any industry.

faqs.question: How can we get started?
faqs.answer: You can make your payment above to get started. After that, you'll be redirected to a form where you can share your business details and optionally book a meeting with us. If you're not 100% sure yet, you can book a free intro call to explore the possibilities and ask any questions.

faqs.question: How does payment work?
faqs.answer: You can pay full, but 50% before we start and 50% after delivery is also possible. Payments are made securely through Stripe. You will also receive an invoice after the payment.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: No, we don’t offer refunds because each project takes a lot of time. That’s why we offer to split the payment, so you only pay the second half when you’re happy with the result.

faqs.question: What if I don’t like the design?
faqs.answer: We always send you a first version of the website for feedback. If you’re not happy, we will adjust the design. If the full website is already done, we can’t redesign everything from scratch.

faqs.question: Are there any extra costs?
faqs.answer: No extra payments from us. If your website needs things like hosting or a paid subscription, you pay for those directly to the provider.

faqs.question: Do you offer ongoing support?
faqs.answer:
Yes. We offer flexible support plans to keep your website fast, fresh, and performing at its best:

  • €150/year (Landing & Standard): Includes regular performance checks, content updates (like text, images, or sections), uptime monitoring, and ongoing conversion optimizations.
  • €250/year (Premium): Designed for more advanced websites. Covers everything in previous plan plus extra updates and advanced checks tailored to complex sites.
  • €0/year: We’ll help you set up hosting, and that’s it. You won’t pay us anything unless you need updates later, which are billed based on the work required.

Our goal is to keep your website doing what it should—bringing in customers—without the stress of managing it yourself.
